snippet.title: Universe Sandbox ² | Update 20 Gameplay
snippet.description:
A New Foundation & VR 2.0 | Update 20 for Universe Sandbox ² is now available. Learn more on our blog: http://universesandbox.com/blog/2017/06/update-20/ 

Buy Universe Sandbox ² now via our website or Steam:
http://universesandbox.com
http://store.steampowered.com/app/230290/

 
Universe Sandbox ² is an accessible space simulator that allows you to ask fantastical what-if questions and see accurate and realistic results in real-time. 

It merges gravity, climate, collision, and physical interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. 

Music by Universe Sandbox ² composer Macoubre: http://www.macoubre.com/

Video recorded in-game using Alpha 19 and Update 20.
